name: Introductory Astronomy
description: An introduction to the fundamentals of astronomy, including the solar system, stars, galaxies, and cosmology.

name: Astrophysics I
description: An introduction to the principles of astrophysics, including stellar evolution, stellar atmospheres, and nuclear astrophysics.

name: Astrophysics II
description: An introduction to the principles of astrophysics, including stellar evolution, stellar atmospheres, and nuclear astrophysics.

name: Stellar Astronomy
description: An introduction to the physics of stars, including their structure, luminosity, and evolution.
